channel.title: Archived on Andi Altendorfer
channel.description: Recent content in Archived on Andi Altendorfer

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

A little late today – enjoy your Sunday!

Image Description

A creatively captured photograph showcasing a river scene flipped upside down, creating an intriguing visual effect. The image features the river’s surface reflecting the sky and the lush green trees on the banks, now appearing as if they are growing from the sky. The blue sky and scattered clouds are mirrored in the water, adding to the surreal and artistic composition of the scene. The greenery on either side frames the river, enhancing the serene and imaginative atmosphere of the photograph.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Thursday, May 8 – After not being able to go for a walk for the last 3 days, I’m back, and here is today’s current picture.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Sunday, May 4 – have fun! A serene river scene captured from a bridge, showcasing calm water reflecting the cloudy sky and lush green trees lining both banks. The dense foliage frames the river, enhancing the tranquil atmosphere. The overcast sky adds a soft, diffused light, contributing to the peaceful ambiance of the natural setting.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Friday, May 2 – enjoy your long weekend! A serene river landscape captured during sunset, showcasing the calm water reflecting the soft hues of the sky transitioning from blue to warm orange. The river is flanked by dense, lush green trees on both banks, creating a natural frame. The tranquil scene is further enhanced by the presence of a bird gracefully flying over the water, adding a sense of life and movement to the otherwise peaceful setting. The perspective from the bridge offers a balanced view of the river flowing gently between the verdant banks, exuding a sense of calm and beauty.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Thursday, May 1 – Have a nice labor day!

Image Description

A captivating image of a river scene captured from a bridge, featuring a striking reflection of the lush green trees and clear blue sky on the calm water surface. The perspective is unique, with the image rotated 180 degrees, creating an illusion of the sky and trees appearing below the water. The dense foliage on both banks frames the river, enhancing the serene and almost surreal ambiance of the natural setting. The bright sky and vivid greenery contribute to the tranquil and picturesque atmosphere.

item.title: Good Morning Internet
item.description:
Good Morning Internet #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Wednesday, April 30 – A fake Friday in Austria. Enjoy!

Image Description

A peaceful river scene captured from a bridge, showcasing the calm water reflecting the clear blue sky and the lush green foliage of the trees on both banks. The image exudes tranquility, with the dense greenery framing the river and the bright sky enhancing the serene ambiance of the natural setting. The perspective from the bridge offers a balanced view of the river flowing gently between the verdant banks.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau Tuesday, April 29 –Oh, a short week– I already can smell the weekend :D

Image Description

A tranquil river scene captured from a bridge, showcasing the calm, reflective water mirroring the clear blue sky and the lush green foliage of the trees on both banks. The image exudes serenity, with the dense greenery framing the river and the bright sky enhancing the peaceful ambiance of the natural setting. The perspective from the bridge offers a balanced view of the river flowing gently between the verdant banks.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Monday, April 28 – Let’s start the last week of April.

Image Description

A serene river scene captured from a bridge, showcasing the calm water reflecting the clear blue sky and the lush green foliage of the trees on both banks. The image exudes tranquility, with the dense greenery framing the river and the bright sky enhancing the peaceful ambiance of the natural setting. The perspective from the bridge offers a balanced view of the river flowing gently between the verdant banks.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Wednesday, April 23 – A lovely start to the day. The white blossoms are almost gone away and everything gets green. Summer is on its way. A tranquil river scene captured during the early morning or late evening, showcasing the calm water reflecting the soft hues of the sky. The river is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, creating a serene and peaceful atmosphere. The sky above is painted with gentle clouds, adding to the overall calmness of the landscape. The reflections on the water’s surface mirror the beauty of the surroundings, enhancing the tranquil mood of the scene.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Tuesday, April 22 – after yesterday’s holiday, I wish you a pleasant and productive work week. A serene Traun River scene captured from a bridge, showcasing the calm water reflecting the partly cloudy sky and the lush green trees lining both banks. The tranquil atmosphere is enhanced by the gentle play of light on the water’s surface, creating a peaceful and picturesque view of nature.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Monday, April 21 – We have to lose the weight we gained on Easter Sunday yesterday, so we walked a bigger loop today. 🚶🚶‍♀️ This image depicts a serene river scene on a clear day. The river flows gently between two lush, green banks lined with trees and shrubs. The water is calm, reflecting the blue sky and the greenery on either side. The sky above is mostly clear with a few wispy clouds, suggesting a bright and pleasant day. The overall atmosphere is tranquil and natural, capturing the beauty of a peaceful riverside environment.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Sunday, April 20 – Have a happy easter Sunday, and enjoy your day. A peaceful riverside scene captured from the Traun Bridge, showcasing the calm river reflecting the clear blue sky and the lush greenery of the trees on the banks. The sunlight illuminates the landscape, creating a tranquil and picturesque atmosphere. The mirror-like surface of the water beautifully captures the vibrant colors of the surroundings.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Friday, April 20 – Today, a little late but … it is Friday ;-)

Image Description

A serene river landscape captured from a bridge, showcasing the calm, reflective water mirroring the overcast sky and the lush green foliage of the trees on both banks. The scene exudes tranquility, with the dense greenery framing the river and the soft light enhancing the peaceful ambiance of the natural setting.

item.title: #notsogoodmorning
item.description:
#notsogoodmorning

Always watch where you’re stepping when you’re occupied with your smartphone!

A song for this experience ;-) www.youtube.com/watch?v=DhBi…

Doggy shit after I stepped in ALT

Doggy shit just before I stepped in ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Some light rain is to come and we are late by 1/2 an hour. So, enjoy your day. This photo captures a tranquil scene from the Traun bridge on a Tuesday morning, just before a light rain. The image showcases the river Traun with its calm, reflective surface mirroring the overcast sky and the bare trees lining its banks. The sky is filled with soft, gray clouds, hinting at the impending rain. The trees, devoid of leaves, stand stark against the muted backdrop, their reflections creating a symmetrical and serene composition in the water. The overall atmosphere is peaceful yet slightly moody, with the stillness of the scene contrasting with the anticipation of the approaching rain. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description: Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet #traunau Starting a new week. The Traun lies calmly and is barely flowing. The water level is a few centimetres higher than it was yesterday. This photo captures a serene and reflective scene of the river Traun on a Monday morning. The image showcases the river’s calm surface, acting as a mirror to the surrounding landscape. The sky above is clear with a soft blue hue, and the trees lining the riverbanks are reflected perfectly in the still water. The bare branches of the trees suggest it might be late autumn or early winter, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. The overall atmosphere is peaceful, with the gentle interplay of light and shadow creating a harmonious and calming visual experience. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

On a beautiful Sunday morning, the river flows calmly, a perfect way to start the day with nature’s serenity. Enjoy the beauty around you and have a wonderful Sunday! A serene river landscape on a Sunday morning, with the water mirroring the blue sky and the surrounding trees. The lush greenery on the riverbanks adds to the tranquility, creating a peaceful and picturesque scene that captures the essence of a calm and reflective morning. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

As we start a new week, may the calm and beauty of this scene bring you peace and focus. A peaceful river scene on a Monday morning, with the water reflecting the clear blue sky and the surrounding trees. The landscape is serene, with the riverbanks lined with greenery, offering a calming view to start the week. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

It’s a beautiful Friday, and the world is awakening with vibrant colors. Have fun! A serene reflection of the morning sky on the calm water, with the sun casting a gentle glow over the landscape. The trees along the riverbank stand tall, their reflections mirrored perfectly in the still water, creating a peaceful and harmonious scene that captures the essence of a beautiful spring morning. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Today, at the same time but an hour earlier due to daylight saving, the floodplain is still asleep. The first birds are beginning to chirp, and the water remains quite murky after the recent rains. A tranquil scene of the Traun River at dawn, with the sky painted in soft hues of blue and pink. The water reflects the serene sky, though it appears murky from recent rainfall, while the silhouettes of trees line the riverbanks, still and peaceful in the early morning light. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Today, on the first Sunday of daylight saving time, we ventured out for a longer walk despite the light rain. The Traun River was flowing much stronger than in recent days, adding a dynamic element to our stroll. A serene view of the Traun River on a cloudy day, with lush greenery lining the banks and the water flowing swiftly, reflecting the overcast sky above. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

A relatively warm but rainy spring morning in the meadows near Traun. The early birds are either already full, or the earthworms don’t taste good this year. At least the worms are out and about everywhere. A serene, misty morning by the river in Traun, where the calm water reflects the tranquil forest, and nature awakens under a soft, rainy sky. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

It is Friday morning, 2°C is still a bit chilly, but it looks like it will be a beautiful day. The image depicts a peaceful river landscape on a cool morning. The river is calm, reflecting the surrounding trees and the light mist hovering over the water. On the right side of the river, there is a wooded bank with bare trees awaiting spring. The left bank is also lined with trees, their branches extending over the water. Two ducks swim peacefully on the water, leaving gentle ripples behind. The scene radiates tranquility and the beauty of nature in the early morning hours. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

The old Dutch painters would have some lovely moments today.

Image Description

A serene and misty morning scene captured from above, showcasing a tranquil river shrouded in fog. The reflection of the trees on the water’s surface is softly blurred by the mist, creating an ethereal and peaceful atmosphere. The muted colors and gentle light enhance the calm and mysterious beauty of the landscape.

item.title: Good morning, Internet!
item.description:
Good morning, Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Here’s our daily photo from the Traun bridge and some other things we experienced or saw on our daily walk.

Have a nice day!

A serene view of the Traun bridge on a Thursday morning, with calm waters reflecting the bare trees along the banks under a cloudy sky. ALT

A pheasant lies lifeless on the gravel path, likely struck by a train during the night, its vibrant feathers contrasting with the muted tones of the surroundings. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Friday, April 18 – Today, the rain has returned, and the morning temperature is back to a seasonal 11°C. Have a nice Easter weekend! A serene river scene captured from a bridge, showcasing the calm, wide river flanked by lush green trees on both sides. The overcast sky casts a soft, muted light over the landscape, creating a peaceful and slightly moody atmosphere. The dense foliage and the gentle flow of the river highlight the natural beauty of the area, even on a rainy day.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Thursday, April 17 – Happy Maundy Thursday! Last night, the lowest temperature was 16°C. Normally, that should be the daytime high temperature for this time of year, and at night, fruit growers should still be worried about frost. Crazy! A tranquil riverside scene captured from an elevated perspective, showcasing the calm river reflecting the sky and surrounding greenery. The lush trees on the riverbank frame the view, their reflections dancing on the water’s surface. The soft light of the day adds a gentle glow, enhancing the serene and picturesque atmosphere of the landscape.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Wednesday, April 16 – The weather forecast predicted 26C for today. I like it, though it is insane for mid-April. Today’s view brings a serene reflection of the sky and trees on the calm river surface. The soft morning light casts a warm glow, creating a peaceful and almost ethereal scene. It’s a perfect moment to pause and appreciate the beauty of nature.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

#goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Tuesday, April 15 – a gorgeous start to the day. A serene riverside scene captured from an elevated perspective, showcasing the calm river as it mirrors the sky and surrounding greenery. The lush trees on the riverbank frame the view, their reflections dancing on the water’s surface. The soft light of the day adds a gentle glow, enhancing the tranquil and picturesque atmosphere of the landscape.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Monday, April 14 – Wishing everyone a wonderful Easter week and all pupils a great holiday! A serene morning view from the Traun Bridge, where the calm river mirrors the sky and surrounding trees, creating a beautiful reflection. The misty atmosphere adds a gentle, ethereal quality to the scene, capturing the tranquility of the early morning light. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Saturday, April 12 – A little bit later than usual. Nevertheless, a beautiful morning, announcing a sunny weekend. And a hint, that I’m very late with un-wintering my motorcycle. A good opportunity today. A serene river scene where the water perfectly reflects the blue sky and surrounding trees, creating an upside-down effect. The lush greenery on the banks adds to the tranquility, making the landscape appear both real and dreamlike, inviting viewers to appreciate the beauty of nature from a fresh angle. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #today

Friday, April 11 – Today, very early. Although it’s not even a full moon yet, and the iPhone is too weak to capture this atmosphere anyway.

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Thursday, April 10 – Today, the waves are in the sky rather than the water, as clouds gently drift above. A peaceful river scene on a Thursday morning, with the sky filled with soft, wavy clouds. The Traun River flows gently, its surface mirroring the sky and surrounding trees, creating a serene and reflective atmosphere that suggests a calm and quiet Holy Week. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Wednesday, April 9 – Today we woke up to temperatures below 0°C. While a sparkling meadow is beautiful, we’ve already packed away our winter gear—perhaps a bit too eagerly. The chill reminds us that winter isn’t quite ready to let go just yet. A serene river landscape on a chilly morning, with the water reflecting the clear blue sky. The banks are lined with trees, and the scene captures the tranquility of nature as it transitions between seasons, hinting at the lingering cold despite the beauty. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description: Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau Tue, April 8 – thrilled that the US isn’t exporting more cars to the EU. I’ll bring my 20y-old Mercedes for its annual service. The best car I’ve owned in the last 40y, confident it’ll continue to serve me well for many more years. – TUCK FRUMP 🫢 A tranquil river flows gently under a partly cloudy sky, with the water reflecting the colors of the morning light. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Sunday, Apr 6 - Despite the beautiful weather, today feels cooler than the past few days. There’s a crispness in the air that reminds us that spring can still have its cool moments. Enjoy the sunshine while it lasts! A serene riverside scene captured on a cool morning, with the sky and trees beautifully reflected in the calm water. The sun casts a bright light, illuminating the landscape, while the cool air adds a refreshing touch to the atmosphere. The trees along the riverbank stand tall, their reflections creating a mirror-like effect that enhances the tranquility of the scene. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Saturday, April 5th – let the day start calmly and smoothly. ❤️ A tranquil river flows gently under a clear morning sky, with the sun casting a soft glow over the landscape. The water reflects the sky and the surrounding trees, creating a mirror-like effect. The banks are lined with lush greenery, adding to the serene and picturesque atmosphere of the scene. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

It is Thursday, April 3rd – Either the sun rose too early today, or we’re running a bit late. Either way, it feels like spring is awakening faster each day, bringing a burst of life and color to the world around us. A serene riverside scene captured in the early morning light, with the sun casting a warm glow over the landscape. The water reflects the sky and surrounding trees, creating a mirror-like effect that enhances the tranquility of the moment. The banks are lined with lush greenery, signaling the rapid approach of spring. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Wednesday, April 2nd – The Traun River is still flowing swiftly today, but the water is noticeably clearer than before. It’s a refreshing sight as nature continues to renew itself. A peaceful scene of the Traun River on a clear day, with the water flowing swiftly and reflecting the blue sky above. The riverbanks are lined with lush greenery and trees, creating a serene and picturesque landscape. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

April 1st - be careful not a fool ;-)

The Traun River continues to flow swiftly and remains murky, even though the rain has stopped. Nature is greening and awakening a little more each day. A serene riverside scene where the swiftly flowing Traun River reflects the overcast sky, with lush greenery and trees lining the banks, capturing the essence of nature’s awakening. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Wednesday, March 26 – A bit damp and foggy today. Remnants of the rain from last night. A tranquil scene captured on a Wednesday morning from the train bridge over the River Traun. The calm water mirrors the bare trees lining the banks, creating a serene and symmetrical reflection. The overcast sky casts a soft light over the landscape, enhancing the peaceful atmosphere. The stillness of the river and the quiet beauty of the surrounding nature evoke a sense of calm and contemplation, as the world slowly awakens to a new day. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet! #goodmorninginternet, #traunau

Sunday, March 23

A beautiful and peaceful Sunday morning. The weather forecast predicted some rain. However, it doesn’t look like it rained last night. This photo presents a captivating reflection of the sky and trees on the surface of a calm body of water. The image is taken from a perspective that captures the mirrored view of the landscape above, creating an almost symmetrical composition. The sky is filled with scattered clouds, which are beautifully reflected in the water, giving the scene a serene and ethereal quality. On either side of the water, bare trees stand tall, their branches reaching out and adding to the tranquil atmosphere. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of nature’s elements, evoking a sense of peace and stillness. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

Friday, March 21 – The first day of Spring ☀️ This time the alt text for the picture is done by Mistral LeChat.

I wish you a pleasant time while the days get longer. Good morning!

This photo captures a serene and picturesque scene of the river Traun. The image showcases the river flowing gently, with its calm waters reflecting the surrounding landscape. On either side of the river, there are trees, some of which appear to be bare, suggesting it might be late autumn or early winter. The sky above is clear with a soft gradient of colors, transitioning from a light blue to a warmer hue near the horizon, indicating either sunrise or sunset. The overall atmosphere of the photo is tranquil and peaceful, highlighting the natural beauty of the river and its surroundings. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

Thursday, March 20 - A little morning fog, but this will be a promising “International Day of Happiness.” Quiet river at sunrise and very light morning mist. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

Wednesday, March 19. This promises to be a wonderful day again. The Traun River. At sunrise. Very clear skies with a very small moon. The water is very calm and the river seems to be barely flowing. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

Less sun today but even warmer than the last days. Let’s see what the day will bring us.

Image caption is done by LeChat again.

#goodmorninginternet, #traunau (join the tag if you do regular pictures at the same place every day to see how the nature awakens this spring) A serene morning view from the drawbridge over the Traun River, captured on a Saturday morning. The calm water reflects the bare trees lining the banks, creating a peaceful and symmetrical scene under a soft, overcast sky. The tranquil atmosphere invites reflection and a sense of calm, as nature’s quiet beauty is mirrored in the stillness of the river. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

Tuesday, March 18 - This promises to be a beautiful day. The quiet, peaceful Traun on a very clear and cloudless day. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

Monday, March 17. Quite windy and cold. The sky is clearing over the Traun and light waves on the water indicate a stiff breeze. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

Sunday, March 16, over the Traun River. The rain has already stopped. The beavers were very busy on both banks. A slightly gray sky over the tranquil Traun River. Plenty of beaver damage on both banks. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

Saturday, March 15. More clouds and more rain than yesterday. The river starts floating just as expected from a river. Saturday morning on the Traun Bridge. More rain and a gray sky. The river is starting to flow again. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

Friday, March 14. Finally, the rain is here. It’s not much but the river is flowing again. In the last few days, it looks more like a lake than a river. Friday morning on the Traun Bridge. Light rain and gray skies. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

It is Thursday, March 13 and it is more cloudy than yesterday. Looks like some rain is on its way- nature and farmers are eager for some moisture after this very dry Winter. Thursday morning, right in the middle of the bridge over the Traun River. The water is calm, the sky is slightly cloudy. A hint of blue peeks through in the distance. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

Wednesday, March 12. No fog like yesterday. Much better :D Picture taken on the middle of the bridge across the Traun River. Some high fog reflection off the smooth river. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

Tuesday, March 11. Even colder than yesterday and quite foggy. Tuesday morning, right in the middle of the bridge over the Traun River. Smooth water but you can’t see much of the river because it is quite foggy today. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

Monday, March 10. It’s a little bit colder than yesterday. Monday morning, right in the middle of the bridge over the Traun River. Smooth water, clear skies, and a touch of high fog reflecting off the smooth river. ALT

item.title: Good Morning Internet!
item.description:
Good Morning Internet!

Starting on March 9 I will post a picture taken at the same place every day during our daily morning walk along the river Traun in Upper Austria.

Here we go … Sunday morning in the middle of the bridge across river Traun. Smooth water, clear sky with some contrails mirrored on the smooth river. ALT

item.title: Elixir in Production: A Retrospective
item.description: Having run Elixir and Phoenix applications in production for several years now, I can confidently say it was the right choice. The stability of the BEAM, the performance of the applications, and the developer experience are all top-notch. The ecosystem has matured, and the community is one of the most welcoming and helpful I’ve ever been a part of. If you’re building for the long term, Elixir and Phoenix are a combination that’s hard to beat.

item.title: Building for the Future with Phoenix
item.description: As I got more comfortable with Elixir, I naturally gravitated towards the Phoenix framework. Building real-time, fault-tolerant web applications with Phoenix was a game-changer. The performance and scalability were unlike anything I had experienced before. LiveView, in particular, blew my mind. The ability to build interactive, real-time user interfaces with server-rendered HTML is a testament to the power and ingenuity of the Elixir ecosystem.

item.title: A New Paradigm: Discovering Elixir
item.description: After years of working with object-oriented languages, I stumbled upon Elixir in 2012 and it was a breath of fresh air. The functional programming paradigm, the actor model, and the BEAM VM were all new concepts to me. It took some time to wrap my head around it, but the elegance and concurrency of Elixir were undeniable. It felt like I was learning to program all over again, but in a good way.

item.title: The Web Revolution and the Rise of PHP
item.description: As the internet started to boom, my focus shifted to web development, and PHP was the language of the hour. It was a chaotic but exciting time. PHP made it incredibly easy to build dynamic websites. I remember the joy of seeing my code come to life in a web browser, creating interactive pages that could be accessed by anyone in the world. It was a paradigm shift from desktop applications to the global reach of the web.

item.title: Adventures in C++ and Object-Oriented Programming
item.description: After mastering the basics with Pascal, I dived into the world of C++. It was a huge leap, introducing me to the complexities of memory management and the power of object-oriented programming. I remember the long nights debugging pointers and the satisfaction of finally getting a complex program to compile and run. C++ was the language that opened my eyes to the performance and control that was possible, and it laid the groundwork for much of my later career.

item.title: My First Steps in Programming: The Pascal Days
item.description: Looking back to the late 80s, my journey into the world of programming began with Pascal. It was a structured and strongly-typed language, which made it an excellent tool for learning the fundamentals of programming. I remember spending hours in front of a Turbo Pascal IDE, mesmerized by the blue screen and the power to create something out of nothing. From simple “Hello, World!” programs to more complex data structures, Pascal taught me the importance of discipline and clear logic in coding.
